member.name: T:Smead.Security.PermissionItem
member.summary: Permissions must match the permissions in the securePermissions table in database

member.name: T:Smead.Security.SecureObject
member.summary: A signed in passport with security permissions must be passed to the class in order to use. This class is used for registering and unregistering objects that need to be secured. The permissions for the object can be added, checked, updated, removed and listed by the class Each object must be of a type defined by the SecureObjectTypeEnum
